name: CrazyDodge
description:
Stressful game for test your patience to the limits in 15 levels!

“A – D” or “Left – Right (arrow)” to move.
“S” or “Down (arrow)” to crouch.
“Space” or “Shift” to jump.
“P” to select completed level.

if you get stress playing my game, please support my work. I will appreciate it
